Package storage

The storage package has all persistent storage-related classes for the project. It also contains some classes that represent data structures found in the database (like the Test, TestFile, TestQuestion, and UserPermission classes).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseStorage
    JDBC-based implementation of PersistentStorage that uses a MariaDB/MySQL database for storage.
    PersistentStorage
    Abstract class that represents the "persistent layer" of the application, storing everything (tests, users, answers, etc.) that must be permanently saved.
    Test  
    TestFile  
    TestQuestion  
    TestQuestion.CanvasRectangle  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    UserPermission
